successes.title: Fuel3D: A handheld 3D scanner for less than $1000
successes.description: The world’s first handheld point-and-shoot, full color 3D scanner available for under $1,000. Fire up your creativity!

Pledges.description: An awesome Fuel3D USB stick/laser pointer combo with our logo.
A limited edition grey T-shirt with our logo on the front, and “Fire up your creativity” along with a cool 3D rendered image on the back.
An early-bird Fuel3D scanner for a really special price. These are beta pre-production units so we are inviting you join our lead customer community and engage with us on product feedback.
A Fuel3D scanner from our first full production batch.
A Fuel3D scanner from our second full production batch.
A Fuel3D scanner from our first full production batch. Plus: one license of Uformia’s MeshUp software for 3D mesh data processing.
A Fuel3D scanner from our first full production batch. Plus: one license of Uformia's MeshUp software for 3D mesh data processing.
A Fuel3D scanner from our second full production batch. Plus: one license of Uformia's MeshUp software for 3D mesh data processing.
A Fuel3D scanner from our third full production batch. Plus: one license of Uformia's MeshUp software for 3D mesh data processing.

Fuel3D scanner with special edition Joshua Harker designed cover. In this exciting collaboration Joshua is designing a unique cover for the Fuel3D (factory fitted and added to your Fuel3D scanner). Described as a “OUIJA planchette executed in the tangled filigree aesthetic” we can’t begin to describe how excited we are!  Check out Josh's website to see examples of his exciting work www.joshharker.com
A Fuel3D handheld scanner. Standard list price but shipped ahead of website orders for delivery.

A Fuel3D handheld scanner. Standard list price but shipped ahead of website orders for delivery. 
Plus: one license of Uformia's MeshUp software for 3D mesh data processing. Meshup offered at standard list price
A unique hand crafted sculpture incorporating a Fuel3D scan of your face, made in gold plated solid silver.
